Description: Slide (colour); a view of the Pyramid of Khufu in the desert, including the sphinx; Giza, Lower Egypt. 35mm slide, polyeste
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: Bryan A L Cranstone
Curator's comments: Bryan Cranstone's, British Museum fieldwork images, from an expedition in 1963 - 64. The title of this box of slides reads: "N.G.F. 1964, NEW GUINEA NATURAL HISTORY. MAPS. S.S. ORSOVA" Mount notes: this transparency was in a box with handwritten notes: "S.S. Orsova Egypt - Gt. Pyramid sphinx 26/6/64". This collection of slides relates to the prints in the BM collection Oc,B107 and B108.
Associated places: Topographic representation of: Pyramid of Khufu
Associated events: Associated Event: British Museum Expedition to Papua New Guinea 1963 - 1964
